channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, my name is Shengwei Lai and I am currently a MFA2021 student in London Business School. My undergraduate school is Fudan University, School of Management. I am interested in stock markets and are looking for work opportunities of equity research in both sell-side and buy-side companies.

item.title: Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments
item.description: get data download data from Eurostat (Arrivals at tourist accommodation establishments), code = tour_occ_arm. The dataset contains number of arrivals in different countries. tour_occ_arm <- get_eurostat(id="tour_occ_arm") glimpse(tour_occ_arm) ## Rows: 206,839 ## Columns: 6 ## $ c_resid <chr> "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FOR", "FO... ## $ unit <chr> "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR", "NR",... ## $ nace_r2 <chr> "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I551", "I5.

item.title: Euro yield curve
item.description: get data download data from Eurostat (Euro yield curves - monthly data), code = irt_euryld_m. The dataset contains government bonds yield of euro region. yield_curve <- get_eurostat(id="irt_euryld_m") yield_curve$maturity <- factor(yield_curve$maturity, ordered = TRUE, levels = c("Y1","Y2","Y3","Y4","Y5","Y6","Y7","Y8","Y9","Y10", "Y11","Y12","Y13","Y14","Y15","Y16","Y17","Y18","Y19", "Y20","Y21","Y22","Y23","Y24","Y25","Y26","Y27","Y28", "Y29","Y30")) #order maturity glimpse(yield_curve) ## Rows: 34,740 ## Columns: 6 ## $ yld_curv <chr> "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "INS_FWD", "IN... ## $ bonds <chr> "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA", "CGB_EA"... ## $ maturity <ord> Y1, Y10, Y11, Y12, Y13, Y14, Y15, Y16, Y17, Y18, Y19, Y2, .

item.title: Gas price
item.description: get data download data from Eurostat (Gas prices for household consumers), code = nrg_pc_202. The dataset contains gas price as for different consumption levels and times. gas_price <- get_eurostat(id="nrg_pc_202") glimpse(gas_price) ## Rows: 42,520 ## Columns: 8 ## $ product <chr> "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4100", "4... ## $ consom <chr> "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "4141901", "41... ## $ unit <chr> "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV", "GJ_GCV"... ## $ tax <chr> "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_TAX", "I_T.

item.title: selected stocks in China A-share market
item.description: get data get stock prices of 7 China A-share companies and Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE) Composite Index using tidyquant package myStocks <- c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS", "000002.SZ","600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.SZ", "000001.SS") %>% tq_get(get = "stock.prices", from = "2015-01-01", to = "2020-09-30") %>% group_by(symbol) name <- data.frame(name = c("Moutai", "Gree", "PingAn", "Hengrui", "Conch Cement", "Vanke","Shanghai Airport", "ICBC", "BYD", "SSE_Index"), symbol = c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS","000002.SZ", "600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.SZ", "000001.SS")) name$name <- factor(name$name, levels = name$name, ordered = TRUE) myStocks <- myStocks %>% left_join(name) #stocks: Kweichow Moutai, Gree Electric Appliances, Ping An Insurance, Hengrui Medicine, Conch Cement, China Vanke, Shanghai International Airport, Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, BYD, CSI 300 Index stock prices trend plot close price trend of all stocks and SSE Composite index from 2015-01-01 to 2020-09-30
